abstract: Random House and RealClearPolitics will work on books on the campaign season.
snippet: Random House and RealClearPolitics will work on books on the campaign season.
lead_paragraph: The Times's Artsbeat blog reports on how Random House is teaming up with RealClearPolitics, a political Web site, to release a series of e-books during campaign. Read more »

headline.main: Random House and RealClearPolitics Team Up
